heading: 1.2 Inferential or hypothesis testing “Are things different”
text: hypothesis, description. Description can highlight, doesn’t test ’s different. Descriptions can still bias (mean vs median vs range show different things descriptively, PCA problems). Doesn’t mean ’s experiment.
code:
summary(cars)##      speed           dist       
##  Min.   : 4.0   Min.   :  2.00  
##  1st Qu.:12.0   1st Qu.: 26.00  
##  Median :15.0   Median : 36.00  
##  Mean   :15.4   Mean   : 42.98  
##  3rd Qu.:19.0   3rd Qu.: 56.00  
##  Max.   :25.0   Max.   :120.00
